name: Armaan Malik
description: '''Armaan Malik''' (born 22 July, 1995) is an Indian [[playback singer]], songwriter, [[Voice acting|voice actor]], and actor. He started his career in 2007 as a child vocalist in [[Bollywood]], making his debut with the song "Bum Bum Bole" from the film ''[[Taare Zameen Par]]''. Malik made his first on-screen appearance in the film ''[[Kaccha Limboo]]'' in 2011. He has been associated with [[Universal Music India]] and [[T-Series (company)|T-Series]].
